problem:
Choose the best answer(directly respond ans0, ans1 or ans2): I get so frustrated with both my kid and grandmother sometimes, even though I know it's not their faults. It's just that my grandmother is out at all hours and I don't know where they are, while my kid can't seem to keep track of what we talked about just five minutes ago - the new information just doesn't stick.
Question: Who probably has an okay memory?
ans0: Undetermined
ans1: My kid
ans2: My grandmother
